text: Ahipara is a town in the Far North District, New Zealand. It is located 14 kilometers south west of Kaitaia and Pukepoto is in between these two. It has a primary school in the township and is very popular with surfing. It has suffered from two fires in February 2019 and October 2020. ==References== Category:Towns in Northland Region Category:Far North District
title: Ahipara
